description: Reminisce with MemoryLane. From writing your life story to preserving family memories, let us help you craft a captivating story. Start your own reminiscence therapy at the comfort of your own home
title: MemoryLane - Reminiscence Therapy
introduction: MemoryLane is an AI-assisted platform that helps users record and preserve their precious memories by writing them into a book. It aims to create a tangible legacy that can be passed down to future generations.
features: Preserves memories in a tangible format
targetPeople: Individuals looking to preserve their memories, especially older adults
